attributes.title: Tokio Marine Holdings GAAP EPS of ¥351.38, revenue of ¥2697.94B; updates FY24 outlook
attributes.content:
• Tokio Marine Holdings press release (OTCPK:TKOMY): 1H GAAP Basic EPS of ¥351.38.
  • Revenue of ¥2697.94B (+10.1% Y/Y).
  • The company has revised its consolidated business forecasts for the fiscal year 2024. The revised consolidated business forecasts are 1,240.0 billion yen for Ordinary profit and 880.0 billion yen for Net income attributable to owners of the parent. The forecasts are based on the following assumptions: - Net premiums written and Life insurance premiums are projected to be 5,080.0 billion yen and 890.0 billion yen respectively. - Net incurred losses related to natural catastrophes occurring during the period are projected to be 116.0 billion yen in Japan and 85.0 billion yen outside Japan. - The Company assumes there will be no significant changes in interest rates, stock market conditions and currency exchange rates from those as of September 30, 2024.

attributes.bio:
Meghavi Singh is an editor on the India news team of Seeking Alpha, based in Pune.

Before joining Seeking Alpha in 2020, she worked with HSBC Bank for 12+ years in the wealth management and Regulatory Reporting departments. Prior to HSBC, she began her career with Gridstone Research, a financial research start-up, as a research associate for a period of 3 years, tracking company events and financial results for the US Consumer Sector.

She has two daughters and lives in Pune, India.
